title: Acer has a powerful new Swift 3 OLED laptop
content:
Today is next@acer, so the press releases are rolling out from Acer. The company announced a wide range of products today, including consumer laptops like a Swift 3 OLED, Spin 3, and Spin 5, along with more eco-friendly laptops from its Vero lineup. Acer Swift 3 OLED First up is the Swift 3 OLED, which

The post Acer has a powerful new Swift 3 OLED laptop appeared first on XDA.
description: Acer is announcing new consumer laptops today, including Swift and Spin devices, as well as more sustainable Vero laptops.
